lead_paragraph: The chances of the National Hockey League shutting down to allow players to compete at the 2018 Winter Games continue to dim, said NHL deputy commissioner Bill Daly on Tuesday as the decision deadlines fast approaches.

headline.print_headline: Winter Games Negotiations Stalled Says NHL
headline.main: Winter Games Negotiations Stalled Says NHL

snippet: The chances of the National Hockey League shutting down to allow players to compete at the 2018 Winter Games continue to dim, said NHL deputy commissioner Bill Daly on Tuesday as the decision deadlines fast approaches....
